page.title: 14Farming.
page.content: Town End Farm, East Witton. Farmed by Mr.Fawbert. Wife, Mrs Fawbert also a supply teacher. Children: Catherine 11 & Christopher 8, who attend Middleham C.E. School& are transported by school bus (Handleys). Farm 130 acres. Sheep farm. 1 farm worker & casual help at lambing time. Typical day:(lambing time):Rise 6am. check sheep; bring out new lambs; see to their feeding; check the sheep newly lambed; feed the lambs that need extra; to bed about midnight Farm equipment: 2 tractors, silage feeder, trailer, Landrover & some shared equipment with local farms. 3 farm dogs: Bess, Floss & Candy. Market price for fleece: Â£2.50 for half bred sheep. Lambs fetch approx Â£40. Nearest markets: Leyburn and Ripon.
